verses.kjv: Be merciful unto me, O God, be merciful unto me: for my soul trusteth in thee: yea, in the shadow of thy wings will I make my refuge, until these calamities be overpast.
verses.ct: Show me compassion, God, show me compassion, because my soul trusts in you. I will take shelter under the shadow of your wings until these disasters have passed.

verses.kjv: I will cry unto God most high; unto God that performeth all things for me.
verses.ct: I call out to God Most High, to God who carries out his purpose for me.

verses.kjv: He shall send from heaven, and save me from the reproach of him that would swallow me up. Selah. God shall send forth his mercy and his truth.
verses.ct: He will reach down from heaven and rescue me from those who hound me and would destroy me. Selah. God will send out his mercy and his truth.

verses.kjv: My soul is among lions: and I lie even among them that are set on fire, even the sons of men, whose teeth are spears and arrows, and their tongue a sharp sword.
verses.ct: My soul is surrounded by lions; I lie among people who burn with rage â€” people whose teeth are like spears and arrows, and whose tongues are like sharp swords.

verses.kjv: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens; let thy glory be above all the earth.
verses.ct: Rise up above the heavens, God! Let your glory cover all the earth.

verses.kjv: They have prepared a net for my steps; my soul is bowed down: they have digged a pit before me, into the midst whereof they are fallen themselves. Selah.
verses.ct: They spread a net to trap my feet; my soul was weighed down. They dug a pit in front of me, but they fell into it themselves. Selah.

verses.kjv: My heart is fixed, O God, my heart is fixed: I will sing and give praise.
verses.ct: My heart is steady, God, my heart is steady. I will sing and make music.

verses.kjv: Awake up, my glory; awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.
verses.ct: Wake up, my soul! Wake up, harp and lyre! I will rise at dawn.

verses.kjv: I will praise thee, O Lord, among the people: I will sing unto thee among the nations.
verses.ct: I will praise you, Lord, among the peoples; I will sing to you among the nations.

verses.kjv: For thy mercy is great unto the heavens, and thy truth unto the clouds.
verses.ct: For your mercy reaches to the heavens, and your truth extends to the clouds.

verses.kjv: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: let thy glory be above all the earth.
verses.ct: Rise up above the heavens, God! Let your glory cover all the earth.
